ModInfo.Name: German Weapons Pack
ModInfo.Author: PaulJay, Mikiztli
ModInfo.Description:
This mods adds some interesting German weapons of the Cold War era.
It includes the P7 (weapon.gw_pistol), MP5 (weapon.gw_submachinegun), G3 (weapon.gw_battlerifle) and MG3 (weapon.gw_machinegun). The images for the G3 and MG3 were derived from images provided by the original game (Xenonauts by Goldhawk Interactive).
